definition[0]: a small card with a name and often an address printed on it, that people in the past gave to people they visited
definition[1]: a card with a special number on that allows you to make cheap telephone calls
example[0]: Prepaid calling cards can save you money when youâ€™re away from home.
definition[2]: a card that allows you to make telephone calls on other telephones and pay for them on your home telephone bill
